I've finished asking around.
It seems there's no known info about Avior, or where it even might be.
You made sure not to give away where we came from, right?
Yes. Thankfully, there's plenty of adventurers passing by around here, often going anonymous too.
Anyway, these lands are called Vienar.
Never heard of such a name.
Me neither.
Most civilization seems to be run by independent city-states, who seem to trade and share frequently, but most oppose each other on a political level.
But, our village lies somewhat distant from most other cities, hence why there's little interest in this place.
So... that means we can stay here safely?
That also means we have no idea how to get back.
Wait, master, are you actually planning to return?
Hm... Maybe.
What!? We can't stay here for the rest of our lives.
Why not?
Aren’t you going to miss your family? Your royal life?
Well, I have to get revenge on Norb, don't I.
Relax, I'm just kidding. I guess our only option to get back is how we got here. We’re gonna need some skilled mages.
That might prove to be a challenge already. From what passing adventurers said, teleportation magic doesn’t seem to be common around here.
Well, all the more reason to make sure our position here is nice and stable.
Plus when else am I going to get the chance to rule anyone but mere servants?
